title: In A Crowded Gaza, A Growing Sense That Nowhere Is Safe
teaser: Two weeks into the conflict in the Gaza Strip, more than 600 Palestinians — mostly civilians — and 29 Israelis have been killed. Two recent Israeli strikes, on a school and a hospital, reflect the scope of Israel's offensive.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
